name: VS Live Game For TikTok - Flags
name_original: VS Live Game For TikTok - Flags
description: This game was made solely for the purpose of TikTok live video streams to collect gifts and have fun with you FANS This version of the game is in development and you can support me by subscribing to my channel and donating few bucks   You can move every part on the screen and turn on/off lights so you can optimize it for your smartphone camera Live a comment,by ;)
